subCards.title: India's Updated Quake Map Warns Entire Himalayan Arc Faces Major Risk, Forcing Urgent Safety Reforms
subCards.abstract: India’s new seismic zonation map has rewritten the nation’s earthquake risk profile by elevating the entire Himalayan corridor into the highest danger Zone VI. Experts say the shift corrects decades of underestimation of the central Himalayan segment, where locked faults continue accumulating stress powerful enough to generate a massive surface-rupturing earthquake. Using global PSHA standards, the updated Earthquake Design Code integrates active faults, maximum magnitudes, soil behaviour, near-fault motion and exposure-based vulnerability. As a result, 61% of India’s land is now officially under moderate to high seismic hazard. The fresh norms introduce strict requirements for buildings, focusing for the first time on non-structural failures that often cause injuries. Critical infrastructure must stay operational even after severe shaking. This map is a blueprint for survival, forcing India to confront its most dangerous natural threat.

images.title: India's Updated Quake Map Warns Entire Himalayan Arc Faces Major Risk, Forcing Urgent Safety Reforms

subCards.title: 'Survived Drowning, Escaped A Bomb Blast, Gave Up Non-Veg': PM Modi On VP Radhakrishnan's Early Life
subCards.abstract: Newly elected Vice President C.P. Radhakrishnan took charge as Speaker and Chairperson of the Rajya Sabha as the Winter Session of Parliament began. Prime Minister Narendra Modi welcomed him, sharing personal anecdotes from Radhakrishnan’s early life. Modi highlighted his dedication to the marginalized, recalling a childhood near-drowning incident at Avinashi Temple and narrowly escaping a bomb blast in Coimbatore. He also mentioned Radhakrishnan’s visit to Kashi, where a spiritual experience led him to give up non-vegetarian food. PM Modi emphasized how these experiences shaped Radhakrishnan’s life and service, underlining his commitment to public welfare and personal values, while celebrating the Vice President’s journey and his role in strengthening the Upper House.

cards.title: What happens if you walk 10,000 steps daily for a month?
cards.abstract: Committing to 10,000 steps daily for a month significantly improves physical and mental health. This simple habit enhances heart health, weight management and overall wellbeing with lasting effects.

cards.title: Samantha Ruth Prabhu marries director Raj Nidimoru in a private ceremony, wedding pics go viral
cards.abstract: Samantha Ruth Prabhu has confirmed her marriage to director Raj Nidimoru after weeks of quiet speculation, sharing a handful of intimate moments from a deeply private ceremony. With only a small circle of guests present, the couple’s Coimbatore wedding has instantly become one of the most talked-about events in the industry.
